other_title: 夢次元ハンター　ファンドラ (Japanese)
plot: Lady Fandora possesses the Jewel of Lupia, which she uses to collect bounties on criminals. Accompanied by her shape-changing friend Que, they embark on a dimensional journey to try and find the elusive Yogu-sogos.
opening_theme: "Dream Hunter" (夢ハンター) by Ushio Hashimoto (ep 1)
ending_theme: "Kokoro no Tobira" (心のとびら) by Ushio Hashimoto (ep 1)
"Akai Uchū" (赤い宇宙) by Ushio Hashimoto
"Sayonara wa Iwanai" (さよならは言わない) by Ushio Hashimoto
insert_song: "Akuma no Mama de" (悪魔のままで) by Ushio Hashimoto (ep 2)
